languages.text: {n}Тело Кассии бьет мелкая дрожь.{/n} "Цвета этой твари... сочятся грязно-алыми оттенками и чернотой непроглядного ужаса. Словно бы сей конструкт целенаправленно впитывал в себя самые ужасные цвета, что могут источать живые существа. Но как... это возможно?"

{n}Cassia's entire body is shivering.{/n} "The colours of this creature... it is oozing with stained crimson shades and the tenebrous blackness of suffering. It is as if this construct was purposefully made to absorb the most dreadful colours that living things can exude. But how is that possible?"
languages.original_text: {n}Тело Кассии бьет мелкая дрожь.{/n} "Цвета этой твари... сочятся грязно-алыми оттенками и чернотой непроглядного ужаса. Словно бы сей конструкт целенаправленно впитывал в себя самые ужасные цвета, что могут источать живые существа. Но как... это возможно?"

It is as if this construct was purposefully made to absorb the most dreadful colours that living things can exude. But how is that possible?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは全身を震わせている。{/n}「この生き物には…汚れた深紅色と、苦しみの黒ずみがにじみ出ています。まるで、生き物が放つ最も恐ろしい色を吸収するために、意図的に作られたかのようです。でも、そんなことが可能なのかしら？」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's entire body is shivering.{/n} "The colours of this creature... it is oozing with stained crimson shades and the tenebrous blackness of suffering. It is as if this construct was purposefully made to absorb the most dreadful colours that living things can exude. But how is that possible?"

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは全身を震わせている。{/n}「この生き物には…汚れた深紅色と、苦しみの黒ずみがにじみ出ています。まるで、生き物が放つ最も恐ろしい色を吸収するために、意図的に作られたかのようです。でも、そんなことが可能なのかしら？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅浑身发抖。{/n}“这个生物的颜色……渗透着染红的阴影与痛苦的黑暗。看起来，这台机械像是专门用来吸收生物所能散发的最恐怖的颜色，但这怎么可能呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's entire body is shivering.{/n} "The colours of this creature... it is oozing with stained crimson shades and the tenebrous blackness of suffering. It is as if this construct was purposefully made to absorb the most dreadful colours that living things can exude. But how is that possible?"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅浑身发抖。{/n}“这个生物的颜色……渗透着染红的阴影与痛苦的黑暗。看起来，这台机械像是专门用来吸收生物所能散发的最恐怖的颜色，但这怎么可能呢？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}A Cassia le tiembla todo el cuerpo.{/n} «Los colores de esta criatura... rezuman tonos carmesí y negrura tenebrosa de sufrimiento. Es como si esta construcción hubiera sido hecha a propósito para absorber los colores más espantosos que pueden irradiar los seres vivos, pero, ¿cómo es posible?».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's entire body is shivering.{/n} "The colours of this creature... it is oozing with stained crimson shades and the tenebrous blackness of suffering. It is as if this construct was purposefully made to absorb the most dreadful colours that living things can exude. But how is that possible?"

traits.locale_text: {n}A Cassia le tiembla todo el cuerpo.{/n} «Los colores de esta criatura... rezuman tonos carmesí y negrura tenebrosa de sufrimiento. Es como si esta construcción hubiera sido hecha a propósito para absorber los colores más espantosos que pueden irradiar los seres vivos, pero, ¿cómo es posible?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassias gesamter Körper bibbert.{/n} "Die Farben dieser Kreatur ... aus ihr quillen schmutzige Rottöne und düstere Schwärze des Leids. Es ist, als sei dieses Konstrukt eigens gebaut worden, um die grauenhaftesten Farben zu absorbieren, die Lebewesen absondern können. Aber wie ist das möglich?"
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's entire body is shivering.{/n} "The colours of this creature... it is oozing with stained crimson shades and the tenebrous blackness of suffering. It is as if this construct was purposefully made to absorb the most dreadful colours that living things can exude. But how is that possible?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassias gesamter Körper bibbert.{/n} "Die Farben dieser Kreatur ... aus ihr quillen schmutzige Rottöne und düstere Schwärze des Leids. Es ist, als sei dieses Konstrukt eigens gebaut worden, um die grauenhaftesten Farben zu absorbieren, die Lebewesen absondern können. Aber wie ist das möglich?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia tremble de tout son corps.{/n} « Les couleurs de cette créature... Elles suintent de nuances écarlates et des ténèbres noires de la souffrance, comme si cette structure avait été conçue pour absorber les pires couleurs que peuvent exsuder les êtres vivants. Mais comment est-ce possible ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's entire body is shivering.{/n} "The colours of this creature... it is oozing with stained crimson shades and the tenebrous blackness of suffering. It is as if this construct was purposefully made to absorb the most dreadful colours that living things can exude. But how is that possible?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia tremble de tout son corps.{/n} « Les couleurs de cette créature... Elles suintent de nuances écarlates et des ténèbres noires de la souffrance, comme si cette machine avait été conçue pour absorber les pires couleurs que peuvent exsuder les êtres vivants. Mais comment est-ce possible ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia'nın bedeni, tepeden tırnağa titriyor.{/n} "Bu yaratığın renklerinden... Lekeli kızıl tonları ve acının kasvetli siyahlığı fışkırıyor. Âdeta bu yapı, yaşayan şeylerin meydana getirebileceği en dehşet verici renkleri emmesi için kasıtlı olarak yaratılmış. Ama bu nasıl mümkün olabilir?"
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's entire body is shivering.{/n} "The colours of this creature... it is oozing with stained crimson shades and the tenebrous blackness of suffering. It is as if this construct was purposefully made to absorb the most dreadful colours that living things can exude. But how is that possible?"
